channel.title: Crystal castles
channel.description:
anyone know music similar to crystal castles?
if you havent heard them: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MigfipDmY-0[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JITI0FskSG0[/youtube]
their first album is more more straightforward (first song is off of it), and their second album is a lot more eerie (the second song is off of it). I personally like the second song better although the first album as a whole is a lot better.
haven't listened to their third album yet, hopefully its good

item.title: Crystal castles
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

I look at her and I see Chibi. Try Looking Glass, by The Birthday Massacre.

Read full topic

I think I stick with Pac, Nasm and Big.

item.title: Crystal castles
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

The first song in my opinion was horrible, the second song however is nice. They try to add too many ‘effects’ if you will to their songs.

Read full topic
